comment.author: 39839593@N00
comment._content: Present day view (Google Streetview). Not much change and the pharmacy is still a pharmacy. It is on the corner of Boulevard Monthyon and Rue Saint-Luc.

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
Michiel2005: Wonderful that the pharmacy is still there, and in business. The buildings are very much the same as in 1937, the cars have changed though... :) Great to compare, and to know the position, thanks a lot ! 
/Anna B.
